name: Enlysia
description: Destination Enlysia, a dark and unwelcome place. You have been sent there to unravel whatever dark secrets there are to be discovered. Once you have entered there is only one option, stay alive!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer, 64-bit Processor: Intel i5 4 cores @ 3.0 Ghz or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 560 or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Sound Card: DirectX® compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer, 64-bit Processor: Intel i7 4 cores @ 3.5 Ghz or equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 780 or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Sound Card: DirectX® compatible
